SEARCH
Package org.jmel.mastermind.core

Class Game.Builder

java.lang.Object
org.jmel.mastermind.core.Game.Builder
Enclosing class:
Game
public static class Game.Builder extends Object
Builder for a Game object.

Different game parameters are set to default values corresponding to a standard Mastermind game. Custom values can be set using the builder's methods and will throw exceptions if invalid values are provided.

    • codeLength

      public int codeLength()
      Returns the current length of the secret code in the builder.
      Returns:
      the length of the secret code

    • codeLength

      public Game.Builder codeLength(int codeLength)
      Sets the length of codes to be used in a game instance.

      The length of the secret code must be greater than 0.
      Parameters:
      codeLength - an integer representing the length of a code
      Returns:
      the current builder object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the code length is less than 1

    • numColors

      public int numColors()
      Returns the current number of colors in the builder.
      Returns:
      the number of colors

    • numColors

      public Game.Builder numColors(int numColors)
      Sets the number of colors that can be used in the secret code.

      The number of colors must be greater than 1.
      Parameters:
      numColors - an integer representing the number of colors that can be used in a code
      Returns:
      the current builder object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of colors is less than or equal to 1

    • maxAttempts

      public Game.Builder maxAttempts(int maxAttempts)
      Sets the maximum number of attempts allowed in a game instance.

      The maximum number of attempts must be greater than 0.
      Parameters:
      maxAttempts - an integer representing the maximum number of attempts allowed in a game
      Returns:
      the current builder object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the maximum number of attempts is less than 1

    • codeSupplier

      public Game.Builder codeSupplier(CodeSupplier supplier)
      Sets the secret code supplier for a game instance.

      If the code supplier is not set, a default code supplier will be used. See CodeSupplier
      Parameters:
      supplier - a CodeSupplier object that supplies a secret code
      Returns:
      the current builder object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the code supplier is null

    • feedbackStrategy

      public Game.Builder feedbackStrategy(FeedbackStrategy strategy)
      Sets the feedback strategy for a game instance.

      If the feedback strategy is not set, a default feedback strategy will be used. See FeedbackStrategyImpl
      Parameters:
      strategy - a FeedbackStrategy object that determines the feedback for a guess
      Returns:
      the current builder object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the feedback strategy is null

    • build

      public Game build() throws IOException
      Builds a Game object with the specified configuration.
      Returns:
      a Game object with the specified configuration
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the code supplier supplies a code which conflicts with codeLength or numColors
      IOException - if the code supplier fails to supply a code
